EmailTemplate.name: MSF Reply to Bloomberg inquiries
EmailTemplate.subject: Your IHS Markit Customer Care Case {!Case.CaseNumber} - Markit Securities Finance Enquiry
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in Markit Securities Finance data.
As an employee at Bloomberg you should automatically have been given access to Markit Securities Finance data.
If you are part of the Sales or Account Management teams or from the Bloomberg Media News Room, and wish to liaise with one of your counterparts at Markit Securities Finance, please reply to this email with any specific account details and we will put you in touch with the appropriate person here.
If you require any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Kind regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} IHS Markit | Customer Care
